official_title: Respecting actions to be taken by the Security Council of the United Nations in Yugoslavia.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the United Nations Security Council should: (1) renew and strengthen the mandate of the United Nations Protection Force to bring about the immediate demilitarization of the Protected Areas in the former Yugoslavia; (2) require the Force to establish conditions for the safe return of refugees and displaced persons to their homes in the Areas; and (3) provide for the reopening of a safe land corridor connecting northern Croatia with Croatia's coastal regions and demand that water and electricity being denied to civilians in coastal Croatia be restored immediately.

titles.title: Respecting actions to be taken by the Security Council of the United Nations in Yugoslavia.
